column1: Unsafe expansion of self-closing HTML tag
column2: Using regular expressions to expand self-closing HTML tags may lead to cross-site scripting vulnerabilities.
column4: This self-closing HTML tag expansion invalidates prior sanitization as [["this regular expression"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-116/examples/UnsafeHtmlExpansion.js:2:18:2:60"]] may match part of an attribute value.
